commit.message:
acinclude.m4 (GLIBCPP_ENABLE_CLOCALE): Search for gettext outside of libc if message translations are being used.

2003-04-29  Phil Edwards  <pme@gcc.gnu.org>

	* acinclude.m4 (GLIBCPP_ENABLE_CLOCALE):  Search for gettext outside
	of libc if message translations are being used.  Fix info text in
	xieee_1003.1-2001 case.
	* aclocal.m4, configure:  Regenerate.

From-SVN: r66267

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,10 @@
+2003-04-29  Phil Edwards  <pme@gcc.gnu.org>
+
+	* acinclude.m4 (GLIBCPP_ENABLE_CLOCALE):  Search for gettext outside
+	of libc if message translations are being used.  Fix info text in
+	xieee_1003.1-2001 case.
+	* aclocal.m4, configure:  Regenerate.
+
 2003-04-29 Joel Sherrill  <joel.sherrill@OARcorp.com>
 	   Loren J. Rittle <ljrittle@acm.org>
 	   Martin v. Loewis  <martin@v.loewis.de>

@@ -1263,7 +1263,7 @@ AC_DEFUN(GLIBCPP_ENABLE_CLOCALE, [
       CLOCALE_INTERNAL_H=config/locale/gnu/c++locale_internal.h
       ;;
     xieee_1003.1-2001)
-      AC_MSG_RESULT(generic)
+      AC_MSG_RESULT(IEEE 1003.1)
 
       CLOCALE_H=config/locale/ieee_1003.1-2001/c_locale.h
       CLOCALE_CC=config/locale/ieee_1003.1-2001/c_locale.cc
@@ -1290,6 +1290,11 @@ AC_DEFUN(GLIBCPP_ENABLE_CLOCALE, [
   glibcpp_localedir=${glibcpp_builddir}/po/share/locale
   AC_SUBST(glibcpp_localedir)
 
+  # A standalone libintl (e.g., GNU libintl) may be in use.
+  if test $USE_NLS = yes; then
+    AC_SEARCH_LIBS(gettext, intl)
+  fi
+
   AC_SUBST(USE_NLS)
   AC_SUBST(CLOCALE_H)
   AC_SUBST(CCODECVT_H)

@@ -1275,7 +1275,7 @@ AC_DEFUN(GLIBCPP_ENABLE_CLOCALE, [
       CLOCALE_INTERNAL_H=config/locale/gnu/c++locale_internal.h
       ;;
     xieee_1003.1-2001)
-      AC_MSG_RESULT(generic)
+      AC_MSG_RESULT(IEEE 1003.1)
 
       CLOCALE_H=config/locale/ieee_1003.1-2001/c_locale.h
       CLOCALE_CC=config/locale/ieee_1003.1-2001/c_locale.cc
@@ -1302,6 +1302,11 @@ AC_DEFUN(GLIBCPP_ENABLE_CLOCALE, [
   glibcpp_localedir=${glibcpp_builddir}/po/share/locale
   AC_SUBST(glibcpp_localedir)
 
+  # A standalone libintl (e.g., GNU libintl) may be in use.
+  if test $USE_NLS = yes; then
+    AC_SEARCH_LIBS(gettext, intl)
+  fi
+
   AC_SUBST(USE_NLS)
   AC_SUBST(CLOCALE_H)
   AC_SUBST(CCODECVT_H)
